FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services

faq-general-1.question: What services does DevMinds offer?
faq-general-1.answer: We offer modern web development, custom software, technical consulting, and ongoing support. We work with the latest technologies to create scalable and efficient digital solutions.

faq-general-2.question: What sets DevMinds apart from other development companies?
faq-general-2.answer: We focus on clean architectures, scalable code, and no technical debt. Each project is treated with personalized dedication, ensuring solutions that truly work and stand the test of time.

faq-general-3.question: How can I start a project with DevMinds?
faq-general-3.answer: It's simple: contact us through the form, email, or WhatsApp. We'll schedule a free initial consultation to understand your needs and design a customized solution.

faq-services-1.question: Do you handle complete web development projects?
faq-services-1.answer: Yes, we work with all types of projects: from simple sites with WordPress or Wix to complex custom-built web applications with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and all the modern technologies needed for a robust and scalable product.

faq-services-2.question: Do you offer consulting services for existing projects?
faq-services-2.answer: Absolutely. We perform code audits, performance optimization, architecture improvements, and technical recommendations for projects in production.

faq-services-3.question: Do you provide support after project delivery?
faq-services-3.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance plans to ensure your application stays updated, secure, and running optimally.

faq-pricing-1.question: How do you handle budgets?
faq-pricing-1.answer: Each project is unique. After the initial consultation, we prepare a detailed proposal with scope, timeline, and fixed price. We also offer payment options in stages.

faq-pricing-2.question: What is the estimated time to complete a project?
faq-pricing-2.answer: It depends on the scope. A landing page can be ready in 1-2 weeks, while complex applications can take 2-3 months. We always establish clear timelines from the start.

faq-technical-1.question: What technologies do you use?
faq-technical-1.answer: We work with React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, TailwindCSS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, and other modern web stack technologies. We choose tools based on the specific needs of each project.

faq-technical-2.question: Do I own the source code?
faq-technical-2.answer: Absolutely. Upon project completion, you receive all the source code, documentation, and necessary access. You are the complete owner of your product.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: DevMinds was born from the passion to create digital solutions that truly make a difference. As recent software engineering graduates, we identified a clear opportunity: many businesses and entrepreneurs need quality technology but encounter generic or overly expensive solutions.
history.paragraph2: We decided to create DevMinds with a clear vision: to offer web development and custom software with the highest quality standards, using the most modern technologies on the market. Our focus centers on understanding each client's real needs and building solutions that not only work but scale and stand the test of time.
history.paragraph3: Today, DevMinds is more than a development company. We are a team of professionals committed to technical excellence, transparent communication, and client satisfaction. Every project we undertake is an opportunity to demonstrate that well-crafted technology can transform businesses.
